subject: Cancel Delivery
description_text:
Evening,

Yesterday I ordered the the Plus X 2-Pedal set without a baseplate. After
some thinking, I've decided I do not need this and would like to cancel my
order.

My order number is Order #SSN5356 and the email attached to my order is the
same as the one I am using right now.

Thank you,
Griffin

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 10025 中
